attributes.action: Make Meriden St & Bordesley St Junction Safe!
attributes.additional_details: The junction of Meriden Street and Bordesley Street has seen almost one road traffic incident a WEEK in the past few months. There needs to be some kind of safety measures drawn up as somebody is going to die if it is not sorted soon. It needs some lights, road humps, anything that will calm and slow down traffic on what is a blind corner. Local homes and business's are starting to worry and suffer too
